name: Blueprint
description: A Blueprint Class allows spawning any Unreal Blueprint Actor in nanos world.

functions.name: CallBlueprintEvent
functions.description: Calls a Blueprint Event or Function
functions.description_long:
Calls a Blueprint Event or Function
Returns all Function return values on Client Side

parameters.name: arguments...
parameters.description: Sequence of arguments to pass to the event

functions.name: BindBlueprintEventDispatcher
functions.description: Assigns and Binds a Blueprint Event Dispatcher

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Callback function to call (the first argument is the blueprint itself)

functions.name: SetBlueprintPropertyValue
functions.description: Sets a Blueprint Property/Variable value directly
